testcase.classname: Browse from home page to all course pages
testcase.name: Verify all courses from homepages (names and professors)

failure.message: Course does not have a professor

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Course does not have a professor at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertFalse(Assert.java:65) at pageObjects.CoursesPage.selectEachCourseAndVerifyDetails(CoursesPage.java:71) at stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.verifyCourseAndProfessorNames(BrowseCoursesSteps.java:69) at ✽.for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor(file:///C:/ST/AnsymoBDD2/src/test/resources/features/BrowseCourses.feature:18)
testcase.system-out: @Exercise5 Scenario Outline: Verify all courses from homepages (names and professors) # src/test/resources/features/BrowseCourses.feature:21 Given the user is on the Ansymo homepage # stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.navigateToHomepage() When the user clicks the "Courses" link in the menu section # stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.clickCoursesLink(java.lang.String) Then the user should see a page with all the courses listed # stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.verifyCoursesPage() For the course Master thesis: The professor(s), if any, is :[] And for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor # stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.verifyCourseAndProfessorNames() java.lang.AssertionError: Course does not have a professor at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertFalse(Assert.java:65) at pageObjects.CoursesPage.selectEachCourseAndVerifyDetails(CoursesPage.java:71) at stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.verifyCourseAndProfessorNames(BrowseCoursesSteps.java:69) at ✽.for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor(file:///C:/ST/AnsymoBDD2/src/test/resources/features/BrowseCourses.feature:18)
